channel.title: Other players in area

item.title: Other players in area
item.dc:creator: @Zoft1 Zoftâ„¢
item.description:
@Zoft1 wrote:

[code]public boolean CountDown() {
Client other = getClient(i);

	if(isRed() == true && isBlue() == false && isNearCoffin() == true && isInWarZone() == true || isRed() == false && isBlue() == true && isNearCoffin() == true && isInWarZone() == true) {
	return true; 
}else {

return false;

}
}[/code]

Thats my code, let me give you the description, for my boss I made it so if the red team is near him the counter starts from 60, but I also want it not to countdown if there is a blue person there the counter stops.

Right now if they are both there the counter still goes how could I fix this?

Read full topic
